hadiths.text: It was narrated that Jabir said:'The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) forbade selling food bought by measure until two Sa' have been measured - the Sa' of the seller and the Sa' of the buyer

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنْ بَيْعِ الطَّعَامِ، قَبْلَ أَنْ يُقْبَضَ
chapter.eng-name: The Prohibition Of Selling Food Before Taking Possession Of It
